comments.comment: I can try to have a look at why this might be tonight (UK time) -- it may well be related to my changes in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/pull/13718>#13718</denchmark-link> , but I assume these tests have run before now on those changes, so I wonder what might be causing it to go wrong now
Mentioned test has been added by this patch.
